title: Fix bot name in system message
description: System message refers to 'n8n-bot' but actual Discord username is 'n8n#8793'. Update system message to match actual bot name or update bot display name to match system message.

title: Enable Discord bot DM support in Developer Portal
description: The bot now has DirectMessages intent in code, but Discord Developer Portal must also have MESSAGE CONTENT intent enabled under Bot settings. Without this, DMs won't be received.
